title: "go env" does not show GOMAXPROCS
body:
``` bash
$ go version
go version devel +2c91114 Fri Oct 2 07:50:52 2015 +0000 linux/386

$ go env
GOARCH="386"
GOBIN=""
GOEXE=""
GOHOSTARCH="386"
GOHOSTOS="linux"
GOOS="linux"
GOPATH="/home/user/golib"
GORACE=""
GOROOT="/home/user/go"
GOTOOLDIR="/home/user/go/pkg/tool/linux_386"
GO15VENDOREXPERIMENT=""
CC="gcc"
GOGCCFLAGS="-fPIC -m32 -pthread -fmessage-length=0"
CXX="g++"
CGO_ENABLED="1"
```
